method.name: IsInitialized

method.name: _security
method.comment:
If security = True Then Pay Successful Else Failed AND User Use The HackTool : LuckyPatcher-GameHacker AND ...

  Sample :

 Sub pardakht_PurchaseCompleted(Successed As Boolean, Product As Purchase)

Dim PRBazarInappSecurity1 As PRBazarInappSecurity

Try If PRBazarInappSecurity1.security = True Then If Successed=True Then ToastMessageShow("Pay Successful Thank You !",False) File.WriteString(File.DirInternal,"Success-pay.txt","paysuccess") B1.Visible=False Else ToastMessageShow("Pay Failed",False) End If Else ToastMessageShow("Please Dont Hack App !!",False) End If Catch End Try End Sub
